Job Role:

Sales Executive for an Advertising Agency

Job Location:

  • Andheri West

Job Description:

  • Looking for a passionate sales executive to join the sales team.
  • The sales executive’s responsibilities include generating leads, making sales calls, continuously updating the CRM database.
  • Sales executive who should be an inspired self-starter and able to drive sales growth. Ultimately, a top-notch sales executive who should be able to build rapport with customers and close sales.

Job Responsibilities:

  • An Executive who will be able to research prospects, generating leads and contacting potential and existing customers on the phone, by email, and in person.
  • Should be able to prepare and send quotes and proposals.
  • Should be able to manage the sales process through specific software programs.
  • Building and maintaining a CRM database.
  • Participating in sales team meetings.

Job Requirements:

  • High school diploma/GED
  • Must have 1+ years of sales experience
  • Require excellent customer service and sales skills
  • Must have strong verbal and written communication
  • Excellent phone and presentation skills
  • Proficiency in Microsoft Office, CRM, and sales software programs
  • Must have good negotiation and problem-solving skills

Salary:

25k – 30k per month (CTC)

Shift Timings:

  • 10 AM TO 7 PM
